    • Method Detail

      • buildSVDMatrix

        public static org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.RowMatrix buildSVDMatrix(org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.RowMatrix tfidfMatrix,
                                                                                 int dimension)
        buildSVDMatrix: Generate SVD matrix from TF-IDF matrix. Please make sure the TF-IDF matrix has been already built from the original documents.
        Parameters:
        tfidfMatrix, - each row is a term and each column is a document name and each cell is the TF-IDF value of the term in the corresponding document.
        dimension - Column number of the SVD matrix
        Returns:
        RowMatrix, each row is a term and each column is a dimension in the feature space, each cell is value of the term in the corresponding dimension.

      • buildSVDMatrix

        public static org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.RowMatrix buildSVDMatrix(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vector> vecRDD,
                                                                                 int dimension)
        buildSVDMatrix: Generate SVD matrix from Vector RDD.
        Parameters:
        vecRDD - vectors of terms in feature space
        dimension - Column number of the SVD matrix
        Returns:
        RowMatrix, each row is a term and each column is a dimension in the feature space, each cell is value of the term in the corresponding dimension.

      • createTFIDFMatrix

        public static org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.RowMatrix createTFIDFMatrix(org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.RowMatrix wordDocMatrix)
        Create TF-IDF matrix from word-doc matrix.
        Parameters:
        wordDocMatrix, - each row is a term, each column is a document name and each cell is number of the term in the corresponding document.
        Returns:
        RowMatrix, each row is a term and each column is a document name and each cell is the TF-IDF value of the term in the corresponding document.

      • createWordDocMatrix

        public static LabeledRowMatrix createWordDocMatrix(org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaPairRDD<String,List<String>> uniqueDocRDD)
        Create matrix from doc-terms JavaPairRDD.
        Parameters:
        uniqueDocRDD - doc-terms JavaPairRDD, in which each key is a doc name, and value is term list extracted from that doc
        Returns:
        LabeledRowMatrix LabeledRowMatrix

      • loadVectorFromCSV

        public static org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaPairRDD<String,org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.Vector> loadVectorFromCSV(SparkDriver spark,
                                                                                                                   String csvFileName,
                                                                                                                   int skipNum)
        loadVectorFromCSV: Load term vector from csv file.
        Parameters:
        spark - spark instance
        csvFileName - csv matrix file
        skipNum - the numbers of rows which should be skipped Ignore the top skip number rows of the csv file
        Returns:
        JavaPairRDD, each key is a term, and value is the vector of the term in feature space.

        public static org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.RowMatrix transposeMatrix(org.apache.spark.mllib.linalg.distributed.IndexedRowMatrix indexedMatrix)
        Transpose matrix
        Parameters:
        indexedMatrix - spark indexed matrix
        Returns:
        rowmatrix, each row is corresponding to the column in the original matrix and vice versa
